The block is pulled to the right a distance <math alttext="x sub maximum" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> from equilibrium and released from rest.
